review: The Fire TV Stick was a disappointment. It ran fine for a few weeks when after I first received it and then started experiencing frequent disconnects despite my Wifi on other devices being solid. I requested a replacement and it too, was fine for a bit longer than the first. I've now returned the replacement because we couldn't even get through one Pandora song before it would disconnect, need a reboot and a retry.

review: So overall, this fire stick is amazing. It's great for doing exactly what it says it does. I've only used it for Netflix and Pandora so I can't speak on anything else like the gaming portion. My problem with the stick is that it really relies on a strong Wifi signal which I don't always have so my stick is always connecting. Like my laptop and phone run well on my wifi now but when I try it with the stick there is never a real steady signal for it to operate off of. So yes, this product is fantastic but make sure you have a strong and steady WiFi signal before purchasing or it'll be hard for you to like it much. Based off my experience anyhow.
author: Nina Perez
